iceberg wilderness

I recently had the privilege of spending a few days in the Carson Iceberg Wilderness with my dad and a buddy. It was great to get away and enjoy the wilderness. We found this great little meadow with a pond, old rundown cabins, and a bunch of cattle with bells. We totally felt like we were in the Alps!
